Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Minnesota in 2006...
Injured on 5/14/2006 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 4/10/2008 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/30/2009, off Jeremy Guthrie (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/2009, off Aaron Harang (CHA)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Tampa Bay on 6/28/2010...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/2010, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2010 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against New York (A), driving in 4 runs on 7/30/2010...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/2010, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/2010, hitting .520 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2010, hitting .427 with 9 HR, 31 RBI...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/10/2011 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from Minnesota to Los Angeles (A) on 5/30/2012 (Going to LAA: LF T. Colvin. Going to MIN: LF R. Willits, P I. West, SS T. Story, RF K. Copeland)...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2014, hitting .315 with 8 HR, 26 RBI...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2014, hitting .308 with 38 HR, 126 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/6/2015...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 4/7/2016...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Seattle on 4/24/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/30/2016, hitting .524 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2016, hitting .391 with 5 HR, 33 RBI...
Injured on 7/7/2016 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Arizona on 3/2/2017 (Going to ARI: LF T. Colvin. Going to LAA: 2B D. Ackley)...
Injured on 4/15/2018 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 7/22/2019...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Philadelphia on 5/8/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/5/2021 with a Sprained Wrist, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/20/2021, off Dario Baeza (PIT)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/1/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $4,125,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/1/2022...
